scripts.database:remove: docker stop devdb && docker rm devdb
scripts.server:makemigrations: poetry run manage.py makemigrations && cd backend/api/migrations && git add . && cd ../../osmosewebsite/migrations && git add .
scripts.server:migrate & seed: npm run server:migrate && npm run server:seed
scripts.preaplose:test: npm run server:migrate && npm run server:seed
scripts.reset data: npm run database:remove && npm run database:create && npm run server:migrate && npm run server:seed
scripts.launch: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run database:run && npm run server:migrate && npm run server:run" "npm run aplose:run" "npm run osmose:run"
scripts.beforeCommit: npm run "server:makemigrations" && npm run "server:format" && npm run "server:lint"
